title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.10 - Revocation of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.10 - Revocation of license

State Regulations

If any racing association that has been licensed by
the commission shall fail to comply with the provisions of sections 4003.7
through
4003.9
of this Part within 30 days
after written demand therefor, or shall knowingly make any false statement in
complying therewith, the commission may revoke such association's license as
provided by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
